title: Firefox (137.01) always opens to a small sized screen
content: I browse using full screen in Firefox. After closing the app and reopening, the browsing window is just 1/4th the size requiring me to expand it, every time. Is this a bug?
creator: terryaiverson

title: "502 Bad Gateway openresty"
content: Hi there, I am trying to go to a site that I go often, but getting this message back - "502 Bad Gateway openresty". That happens once in a while, I can generally access the site without problems,. What should I do? thanks
creator: marcelomaiaphoto

title: authenticator
content: I know nothing about computers, I am 80 years old. I have been trying to get authenticator for weeks. i DON'T KNOW HOW TO GET IT !!! CAN YOU SHOW ME ? I am deaf and have no phone. I only use facebook, messenger and yahoo e-mail, plus play pch games. Thanks for any help
creator: lbw12344

title: firefox performance terrible following windows update - youtube not loading properly, unable to access some research sites, and more
content:
What is going on with firefox, are is it being even more dminished now by microsoft and google? since some update, i cant watch even a youtube video due to the length of time it takes with buffering and loading , and my university LMS pages arent loading and trying to download a pdf from researchgate not even working.

embedded apps like padlet dont seem to be working either

I have flushed out cookies and caches and restarted many times - still the same issues, I went in to troubleshoot mode and still the same issues.

If i try Microsoft Edge it seems things are working fine, and if i access firefox using a VPN (i am in australa, but i set it to a country in europe) then firefox works fine -- what is going on?

please fix this
creator: mitchellnolte

title: EMAIL
content: I received a code of: SSL_ERROR_RX_RECORD_TOO_LONG and do not know how to solve the problem.
